notifications.uploadSuccessDetailed:
Upload successful!
The program has been flashed to the micro:bit.

The file was not processed by the board.
Please check that the board is properly connected and try again.
notifications.uploadProgressHexWritten:
HEX file written to the board.
Checking upload status...
notifications.invalidCode: Code is not a compiled .hex file
notifications.installSuccess: MicroPython V1 and V2 runtimes installed
notifications.installPartial: MicroPython runtime partially installed (V1 or V2)
notifications.installError: Unable to install MicroPython runtimes (check write permissions)
notifications.installErrorDetailFallback: Check Internet connection and write permissions for the cache folder.
notifications.installErrorMissing: MicroPython HEX files not found. Use "Micro:bit > Install runtimes" to download them.
notifications.installManual: Runtimes unavailable online. Place MICROBIT.hex (V2) and/or MICROBIT_V1.hex (V1) in the cache.

convertedCode.description: This code has been automatically converted from MakeCode Python to standard MicroPython
